derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Spanish barrilla, diminutive of barra 'bar'

means.word_mean: 1. bushy plant of Old World salt marshes and sea beaches having prickly leaves; burned to produce a crude soda ash
2. Algerian plant formerly burned to obtain calcium carbonate
